name: Low Key
description:
This is a game where you just press the keys on your keyboard to try to gain a high score. I hope you enjoy this silly and pointless game I made :D

This game is a submission to the Finally Finish Something 2021 game jam. 

FAQs

Q: The game doesn't run, what should I do?

A: Check that your antivirus is not interfering with the program or that the "data" folder is extracted.
